Effective Date: 05/07/2024

Welcome to TeleMedConnect. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our telemedicine services. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not use our services.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information

We collect personal information that you provide to us directly when you register for an account, use our services, or communicate with us. This information may include:

  • Name
  • Email Address
  • Phone Number
  • Date of Birth
  • Gender
  • Medical History
  • Insurance Information
  • Payment Information
  • Other information you provide during your interaction with our services

1.2 Health Information

As a telemedicine service, we may collect health-related information that you provide during consultations with healthcare providers, including but not limited to:

  • Medical Symptoms
  • Diagnosis
  • Treatment Plans
  • Prescriptions
  • Lab Results
  • Medical Records

1.3 Usage Data

We may automatically collect information about your device and how you interact with the App, including:

  • Device Information: IP address, device type, operating system, unique device identifiers.
  • Usage Information: Access times, pages viewed, links clicked, and the page you visited before navigating to our App.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect to:

  • Provide and Improve Services: To deliver and enhance the telemedicine services you request, including consultations, treatment recommendations, and follow-up care.
  • Communication: To communicate with you about your appointments, updates, and notifications related to your health and the App.
  • Billing and Payments: To process payments for services and manage your account.
  • Compliance: To comply with legal and regulatory requirements, including reporting as required by law.
  • Marketing: To provide you with information about our services, new features, or other opportunities that may be of interest to you, subject to your preferences.

3. How We Share Your Information

We may share your information in the following circumstances:

  • With Healthcare Providers: To deliver telemedicine services, your information will be shared with healthcare professionals as necessary for diagnosis and treatment.
  • Service Providers: With third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services, such as payment processors, cloud storage providers, and analytics services.
  • Legal Requirements: If required by law or in response to a legal request, such as a subpoena, court order, or government investigation.
  • Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets.

4. Security of Your Information

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

5. Your Choices and Rights

  • Access and Correction: You may access, update, or correct your personal information by logging into your account or contacting us directly.
  • Data Deletion: You may request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain legal requirements.
  • Opt-Out: You can opt out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those communications or contacting us.

6. Children’s Privacy

Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our App and updating the “Effective Date” at the top of this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Email: [support@yourapp.com]

Phone: [+1 (123) 456-7890]

Address: [123 Health Ave, City, State, ZIP]

Last Updated: 05/06/2024

Welcome to TeleMedConnect!

These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your use of TeleMedConnect, including our website, mobile applications, and services (collectively, the "Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use our Services.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By registering for or using our Services, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old or the age of majority in your jurisdiction and have the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement. If you are using the Services on behalf of an entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind that entity to these Terms.

2. Services Provided

TeleMedConnect offers telemedicine services that allow users to consult with healthcare providers remotely. Our Services include:

  • Video Consultations: Real-time video communication with healthcare providers.
  • Messaging: Secure messaging for consultations and follow-ups.
  • Prescription Services: Issuance and management of electronic prescriptions.
  • Health Records: Storage and access to personal health information.

3. User Responsibilities

3.1 Registration

To use certain features of the Services, you may be required to create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

3.2 Account Security

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

3.3 User Conduct

You agree not to use the Services for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Services. You also agree not to:

  • Upload or transmit any content that is illegal, harmful, or offensive.
  • Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or networks.
  • Engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the Services.

4. Privacy and Data Protection

Our collection and use of your personal information are governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated by reference into these Terms. By using our Services, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in the Privacy Policy.

5. Medical Disclaimer

5.1 No Medical Advice

The Services are not intended to provide medical advice. The information and content provided through the Services are for informational purposes only and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

5.2 Provider-Patient Relationship

The use of the Services does not create a provider-patient relationship between you and TeleMedConnect. Consultations with healthcare providers through the Services may result in the formation of a provider-patient relationship, subject to the terms of your agreement with the healthcare provider.

6. Intellectual Property

6.1 Ownership

All content, features, and functionality of the Services, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the exclusive property of TeleMedConnect or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

6.2 License

You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the Services for your personal, non-commercial use. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on the Services without our express written consent.

7. Termination

7.1 Termination by You

You may terminate your account and stop using the Services at any time by following the account deletion instructions in the App or contacting us at [support@yourapp.com].

7.2 Termination by Us

We may suspend or terminate your access to the Services at any time, with or without notice, for any reason, including if we believe that you have violated these Terms.

8. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, TeleMedConnect and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:

  • Your use of or inability to use the Services.
  • Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein.
  • Any errors or omissions in any content or for any loss or damage incurred as a result of the use of any content posted, transmitted, or otherwise made available through the Services.

9. Governing Law

These Terms and your use of the Services are governed by the laws of the [State/Country], without regard to its conflict of laws principles. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in [Your Jurisdiction] for the resolution of any disputes arising out of or related to these Terms or your use of the Services.

10. Changes to Terms

We may modify these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated Terms on our App. Your continued use of the Services after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms. If you do not agree to the revised Terms, you must stop using the Services.

11. Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms or the Services, please contact us at:

Email: [support@yourapp.com]

Phone: [+1 (123) 456-7890]

Address: [123 Health Ave, City, State, ZIP]
By providing your mobile number, you give us permission to contact you via text.
